attributes.action: Do not call a general election
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to be held ccountable for their performance against their manifesto pledges at the end - the public needs to be be given stability
attributes.background: Debate why it is in interest of Parliament to be given the actual life time of  five years (max)  to be able to carry out its manifesto pledges which it has been elected to do so

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do Not Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703000
